Articles.Content:
Just finished this little video. I had fun making it. Let me know what you think ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/zMGsaKih--0?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Nice job. I wish we could have a split screen view on the maneuver-planner so we can see the maneuver node in one view and the destination on the other view. It would save all of the zooming and/or panning like you had to do for your Kerbin SOI escape burn.
That's a good idea ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) I'll look into it
